column1: '''Eryn Lasgalen''' or '''Wood of Greenleaves''' was the new name chosen by [[Celeborn]] and [[Thranduil]] for the forest that had been known as [[Mirkwood]] for much of the [[Third Age]].<ref>{{App
Its name is almost the same as the pre-Mirkwood name [[Mirkwood
column4: TA}}</ref> but with the addition of the [[Sindarin]] word ''[[las]]'' ("leaf").
